channel.title: Project Vanity - RuneSource/Project Insanity
channel.description:
[ul]this is a Project Insanity replicate, using RuneSource. what i mean when i say it's a 'replicate' is that i don't mean it's copied completely (packaging, networking etceta), this still uses: rs/RuneSource's networking, packets, tasks etcetera.
now that we've cleared that up, i haven't released anything in a while so thought i'd release this.
[b]the good thing about this is, is that anything from Project Insanity you can replicate into thus. although, that wouldn't be good because it is, after all, 'THE' hated Project Insanity. but i mean content wise.[/b] [size=8pt][b]anyone who is familiar with Project Insanity will be able to understand this easily, so i suggest using it, as it's RuneSource![/b][/size]
features: [list] [li]updating[/li] [li]skills[/li] [li]inventory support[/li] [li]objects[/li] [li]walking/running/rendering[/li] [li]action handler(s)[/li] [li]minigames[/li][/list] and so fourth.....
it all may seem so good, however there is a downside. i did completely remove my npc system, which consists of: loading, reading, writing, registering, de-registering and processing npc's ;(. not only this but i also got rid of my combat, as i'm using it (not hard to add guys!), just rip Project Insanity's or something.
Source: http://up.ht/VChVLF Client: USE ANY 317 CLIENT W/CACHE.[/ul]
snippet stuff:
Project Insanity: [code]c.getPA().sendMessage("message.");[/code] Project Vanity: [code]player.getPA().sendMessage("message.");[/code]

item.title: Project Vanity - RuneSource/Project Insanity
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:14, topic:477638”][quote author=strucker link=topic=595835.msg4195618#msg4195618 date=1357448270]

No pics no clicks
[/quote] 100 errors it shud be something like

	boolean hasPics;
	boolean noPics() {
		if (hasPics = false) {
		}
		return true;
	}
	public void clicks(int clicks) {
		if (hasPics = true) {
			c.addItem(clicks, 1000);
		} else if (noPics) {
			c.addItem(clicks, 0);
		}

	}

Actually would be

	private void scanPics() {
		if (TopicContains instanceof Pics)
			hasNoPics = false;
		else if (TopicContains instanceof NoPics)
			hasNoPics = true;
	}
	private boolean hasNoPics;
	private boolean hasPics() {
		if (hasNoPics)
			return false;
		return true;
	}
	private boolean hasClicks() {
		if (hasPics)
			return true;
		return false;
	}

TopicContains.java

public final class TopicContains extends Pics implements NoPics {
	
	private String topic = "http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,595835";
	String scanTopic = topic.scan();
	for (int i = 0; i < hostingCompanies.length; i++) {
		if (scanTopic.contains(hostingCompanies[i]))
			Pics != null;
		else {
			NoPics != null;
			System.out.println("Pics is null.");
		}
	}

}

Pics.java

public abstract class Pics {

	public String[] hostingCompanies = {"imgur.com", "imageshack.us"};
	// TODO Add more hosting companies.

}

NoPics.java

public abstract interface NoPics {

	public boolean noPics() {
		if (hostingCompanies != null)
			return false;
		return true;
	}

}

Just sayin. :P[/quote]omg ty ty ill put this in my serva.lololol

bump

Read full topic

item.title: Project Vanity - RuneSource/Project Insanity
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“strucker, post:8, topic:477638”][quote author=Server Sniffer link=topic=595835.msg4195549#msg4195549 date=1357441228]
No pics no clicks
[/quote] 100 errors it shud be something like

[code=java]
boolean hasPics;
boolean noPics() {
if (hasPics = false) {
}
return true;
}
public void clicks(int clicks) {
if (hasPics = true) {
c.addItem(clicks, 1000);
} else if (noPics) {
c.addItem(clicks, 0);
}

}

[/code][/quote]

Actually would be

	private void scanPics() {
		if (TopicContains instanceof Pics)
			hasNoPics = false;
		else if (TopicContains instanceof NoPics)
			hasNoPics = true;
	}
	private boolean hasNoPics;
	private boolean hasPics() {
		if (hasNoPics)
			return false;
		return true;
	}
	private boolean hasClicks() {
		if (hasPics)
			return true;
		return false;
	}

TopicContains.java

public final class TopicContains extends Pics implements NoPics {
	
	private String topic = "http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,595835";
	String scanTopic = topic.scan();
	for (int i = 0; i < hostingCompanies.length; i++) {
		if (scanTopic.contains(hostingCompanies[i]))
			Pics != null;
		else {
			NoPics != null;
			System.out.println("Pics is null.");
		}
	}

}

Pics.java

public abstract class Pics {

	public String[] hostingCompanies = {"imgur.com", "imageshack.us"};
	// TODO Add more hosting companies.

}

NoPics.java

public abstract interface NoPics {

	public boolean noPics() {
		if (hostingCompanies != null)
			return false;
		return true;
	}

}

Just sayin.

Read full topic

item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“Server Sniffer, post:6, topic:477638”]No pics no clicks[/quote]It’s not really developed… It’s designed so people download it and build on it. So it’s basically a blank PI look alike.

Looks wonderful!

EDIT:
I’m probably really dumb… But I get an oopsy I don’t know what to do with :I

java.lang.NullPointerException at com.rs2.model.players.Player.login(Player.java:205) at com.rs2.net.Login.handleLogin(Login.java:116) at com.rs2.model.players.packets.PacketManager.handleIncomingData(PacketManager.java:119) at com.rs2.Server.cycle(Server.java:168) at com.rs2.Server.run(Server.java:93) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

@Int_Bauk wrote:

[ul]this is a Project Insanity replicate, using RuneSource.
what i mean when i say it’s a ‘replicate’ is that i don’t mean it’s copied completely (packaging, networking etceta), this still uses: rs/RuneSource’s networking, packets, tasks etcetera.

[size=8pt]anyone who is familiar with Project Insanity will be able to understand this easily, so i suggest using it, as it’s RuneSource![/size]

features:
[list]
[li]updating[/li]

[li]walking/running/rendering[/li]

and so fourth…

not only this but i also got rid of my combat, as i’m using it (not hard to add guys!), just rip Project Insanity’s or something.
